entity.description: Person with whom a business unit has a relationship, such as customer, supplier, and colleague.

attributes.name: contactId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for Check-in associated with Contact.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: Type the contact's first name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: Type the contact's last name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the contact is active or inactive. Inactive contacts are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: customerSizeCode
attributes.description: Select the size of the contact's company for segmentation and reporting purposes.

attributes.name: customerTypeCode
attributes.description: Select the category that best describes the relationship between the contact and your organization.

attributes.name: preferredContactMethodCode
attributes.description: Select the preferred method of contact.

attributes.name: leadSourceCode
attributes.description: Select the primary marketing source that directed the contact to your organization.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the contact.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the contact.

attributes.name: paymentTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount.

attributes.name: shippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: accountId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the contact is associated.

attributes.name: participatesInWorkflow
attributes.description: Shows whether the contact participates in workflow rules.

attributes.name: isBackofficeCustomer
attributes.description: Select whether the contact exists in a separate accounting or other system, such as Microsoft Dynamics GP or another ERP database, for use in integration processes.

attributes.name: salutation
attributes.description: Type the salutation of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email messages, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: jobTitle
attributes.description: Type the job title of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: department
attributes.description: Type the department or business unit where the contact works in the parent company or business.

attributes.name: nickName
attributes.description: Type the contact's nickname.

attributes.name: middleName
attributes.description: Type the contact's middle name or initial to make sure the contact is addressed correctly.

attributes.name: suffix
attributes.description: Type the suffix used in the contact's name, such as Jr. or Sr. to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: yomiFirstName
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's first name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: fullName
attributes.description: Combines and shows the contact's first and last names so that the full name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: yomiMiddleName
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's middle name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: yomiLastName
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's last name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: anniversary
attributes.description: Enter the date of the contact's wedding or service anniversary for use in customer gift programs or other communications.

attributes.name: birthDate
attributes.description: Enter the contact's birthday for use in customer gift programs or other communications.

attributes.name: governmentId
attributes.description: Type the passport number or other government ID for the contact for use in documents or reports.

attributes.name: yomiFullName
attributes.description: Shows the combined Yomi first and last names of the contact so that the full phonetic name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the contact, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

attributes.name: employeeId
attributes.description: Type the employee ID or number for the contact for reference in orders, service cases, or other communications with the contact's organization.

attributes.name: genderCode
attributes.description: Select the contact's gender to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: annualIncome
attributes.description: Type the contact's annual income for use in profiling and financial analysis.

attributes.name: hasChildrenCode
attributes.description: Select whether the contact has any children for reference in follow-up phone calls and other communications.

attributes.name: educationCode
attributes.description: Select the contact's highest level of education for use in segmentation and analysis.

attributes.name: webSiteUrl
attributes.description: Type the contact's professional or personal website or blog URL.

attributes.name: familyStatusCode
attributes.description: Select the marital status of the contact for reference in follow-up phone calls and other communications.

attributes.name: ftpSiteUrl
attributes.description: Type the URL for the contact's FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents.

attributes.name: EMailAddress1
attributes.description: Type the primary email address for the contact.

attributes.name: spousesName
attributes.description: Type the name of the contact's spouse or partner for reference during calls, events, or other communications with the contact.

attributes.name: assistantName
attributes.description: Type the name of the contact's assistant.

attributes.name: EMailAddress2
attributes.description: Type the secondary email address for the contact.

attributes.name: assistantPhone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the contact's assistant.

attributes.name: EMailAddress3
attributes.description: Type an alternate email address for the contact.

attributes.name: doNotPhone
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from any phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: managerName
attributes.description: Type the name of the contact's manager for use in escalating issues or other follow-up communications with the contact.

attributes.name: managerPhone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the contact's manager.

attributes.name: doNotFax
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from any fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: doNotEMail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365. If Do Not Allow is selected, Microsoft Dynamics 365 will not send the email.

attributes.name: doNotPostalMail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: doNotBulkEMail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts bulk email sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the email.

attributes.name: doNotBulkPostalMail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the letters.

attributes.name: accountRoleCode
attributes.description: Select the contact's role within the company or sales process, such as decision maker, employee, or influencer.

attributes.name: territoryCode
attributes.description: Select a region or territory for the contact for use in segmentation and analysis.

attributes.name: creditLimit
attributes.description: Type the credit limit of the contact for reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: creditOnHold
attributes.description: Select whether the contact is on a credit hold, for reference when addressing invoice and accounting issues.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: numberOfChildren
attributes.description: Type the number of children the contact has for reference in follow-up phone calls and other communications.

attributes.name: childrensNames
attributes.description: Type the names of the contact's children for reference in communications and client programs.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the contact.

attributes.name: mobilePhone
attributes.description: Type the mobile phone number for the contact.

attributes.name: pager
attributes.description: Type the pager number for the contact.

attributes.name: telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the contact.

attributes.name: aging30
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: aging60
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the contact's status.

attributes.name: aging90
attributes.description: For system use only.

attributes.name: parentContactId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the parent contact.

attributes.name: address1AddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 1.

attributes.name: address1AddressTypeCode
attributes.description: Select the primary address type.

attributes.name: address1Name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the primary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address1PrimaryContactName
attributes.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's primary address.

attributes.name: address1Line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1City
attributes.description: Type the city for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1StateOrProvince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1County
attributes.description: Type the county for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1PostOfficeBox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1PostalCode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1UTCOffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address1FreightTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms for the primary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

attributes.name: address1UPSZone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the primary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address1Latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1Telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1ShippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: address1Telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1Fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address2AddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 2.

attributes.name: address2AddressTypeCode
attributes.description: Select the secondary address type.

attributes.name: address2Name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the secondary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address2PrimaryContactName
attributes.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2City
attributes.description: Type the city for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2StateOrProvince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2County
attributes.description: Type the county for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2PostOfficeBox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2PostalCode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2UTCOffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address2FreightTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms for the secondary address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

attributes.name: address2UPSZone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the secondary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address2Latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2Telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2ShippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: address2Telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2Fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: preferredSystemUserId
attributes.description: Choose the regular or preferred customer service representative for reference when scheduling service activities for the contact.

attributes.name: masterId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the master contact for merge.

attributes.name: preferredAppointmentDayCode
attributes.description: Select the preferred day of the week for service appointments.

attributes.name: preferredAppointmentTimeCode
attributes.description: Select the preferred time of day for service appointments.

attributes.name: doNotSendMM
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts marketing materials, such as brochures or catalogs. Contacts that opt out can be excluded from marketing initiatives.

attributes.name: parentCustomerId
attributes.description: Select the parent account or parent contact for the contact to provide a quick link to additional details, such as financial information, activities, and opportunities.

attributes.name: merged
attributes.description: Shows whether the account has been merged with a master contact.

attributes.name: externalUserIdentifier
attributes.description: Identifier for an external user.

attributes.name: lastUsedInCampaign
attributes.description: Shows the date when the contact was last included in a marketing campaign or quick campaign.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: annualIncomeBase
attributes.description: Shows the Annual Income field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: creditLimitBase
attributes.description: Shows the Credit Limit field converted to the system's default base currency for reporting purposes. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: aging60Base
attributes.description: Shows the Aging 60 field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: aging90Base
attributes.description: Shows the Aging 90 field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: aging30Base
attributes.description: Shows the Aging 30 field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the contact.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: address2Composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete secondary address.

attributes.name: address1Composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete primary address.

attributes.name: entityImageId
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Contact record.

attributes.name: SLAInvokedId
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onHoldTime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastOnHoldTime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: followEmail
attributes.description: Information about whether to allow following email activity like opens, attachment views and link clicks for emails sent to the contact.

attributes.name: timeSpentByMeOnEmailAndMeetings
attributes.description: Total time spent for emails (read and write) and meetings by me in relation to the contact record.

attributes.name: address3Country
attributes.description: the country or region for the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3Line1
attributes.description: the first line of the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3Line2
attributes.description: the second line of the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3Line3
attributes.description: the third line of the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3PostalCode
attributes.description: the ZIP Code or postal code for the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3PostOfficeBox
attributes.description: the post office box number of the 3rd address.

attributes.name: address3StateOrProvince
attributes.description: the state or province of the third address.

attributes.name: address3City
attributes.description: Type the city for the 3rd address.

attributes.name: business2
attributes.description: Type a second business phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: callback
attributes.description: Type a callback phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: company
attributes.description: Type the company phone of the contact.

attributes.name: home2
attributes.description: Type a second home phone number for this contact.

attributes.name: address3AddressId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 3.

attributes.name: address3Composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete third address.

attributes.name: address3Fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the third address.

attributes.name: address3FreightTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms for the third address to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

attributes.name: address3Latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the third address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address3Longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the third address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address3Name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the third address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address3PrimaryContactName
attributes.description: Type the name of the main contact at the account's third address.

attributes.name: address3ShippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: address3Telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the third address.

attributes.name: address3Telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the third address.

attributes.name: address3Telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address3UPSZone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the third address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address3UTCOffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address3County
attributes.description: Type the county for the third address.

attributes.name: address3AddressTypeCode
attributes.description: Select the third address type.

attributes.name: createdByExternalParty
attributes.description: Shows the external party who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedByExternalParty
attributes.description: Shows the external party who modified the record.

attributes.name: marketingOnly
attributes.description: Whether is only for marketing

attributes.name: defaultPriceLevelId
attributes.description: Choose the default price list associated with the contact to make sure the correct product prices for this customer are applied in sales opportunities, quotes, and orders.

attributes.name: originatingLeadId
attributes.description: Shows the lead that the contact was created if the contact was created by converting a lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365. This is used to relate the contact to the data on the originating lead for use in reporting and analytics.

attributes.name: preferredEquipmentId
attributes.description: Choose the contact's preferred service facility or equipment to make sure services are scheduled correctly for the customer.

attributes.name: preferredServiceId
attributes.description: Choose the contact's preferred service to make sure services are scheduled correctly for the customer.
